DOC.criteria: Written confirm diagnosis Rheumatoid Arthritis per ACR/EULAR 2010 criterion . If patient oral corticosteroid , dose must stable 6 week prior baseline visit . Willingness ability comply study procedure . Any systemic inflammation condition ( RA ) , connective tissue disease chronic pain disorder may interfere interpretation outcome data . Examples include psoriatic arthritis , reactive arthritis , gout , systemic lupus erythematosus ( SLE ) , polymyalgia rheumatic and/or temporal arteritis , Lyme 's disease , fibromyalgia chronic fatigue syndrome . Major surgery plan within 8 week prior screen plan surgery throughout study period . Treatment investigational agent ≤ 4 week prior baseline ( 5 ≤ halflives investigational drug , whichever long ) . Intramuscular/intraarticular glucocorticoid 6 week prior baseline visit . Active infection . Septic arthritis within native joint within last 12 month . Sepsis prosthetic joint within 12 month indefinitely joint remains situ . Known HIV hepatitis B/C infection . Latent TB infection unless complete adequate antibiotic prophylaxis . Malignancy ( basal cell carcinoma ) within last 10 year . New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) grade 3 4 congestive cardiac failure . Demyelinating disease . Presence transplant organ ( exception corneal transplant > 3 month prior screen ) . Known recent substance abuse ( drug alcohol ) .
